Package Repository

Class ContractRepository

java.lang.Object
Repository.ContractRepository
public class ContractRepository
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Vadim Novoselov

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int contractsQuantity
    Field that stores the number of contracts added to the repository
    private static int delta
    Variable that determines how much the repository will grow when it is full
    private Contract[] repository
    An array of the Contract type that contains contracts

    Constructor-creates a ContractRepository object and initializes the repository field

  • Field Details

    • repository

      private Contract[] repository
      An array of the Contract type that contains contracts

    • contractsQuantity

      private int contractsQuantity
      Field that stores the number of contracts added to the repository

    • delta

      private static final int delta
      Variable that determines how much the repository will grow when it is full
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • ContractRepository

      public ContractRepository()
      Constructor-creates a ContractRepository object and initializes the repository field

  • Method Details

    • addContract

      public void addContract​(Contract contract)
      Function for adding a new contract to the repository
      Parameters:
      contract - The contract that will be added to the repository. The contract class must be a descendant of the abstract Contract class

    • resizeRepository

      private Contract[] resizeRepository()
      A function that changes the size of the current repository. Called when the repository is already full when adding a new contract. Increases the repository size by delta
      Returns:
      Returns the repository with the increased size.

    • deleteContract

      public boolean deleteContract​(int contractId)
      Function for deleting a contract from the repository
      Parameters:
      contractId - Value of the contract id to delete
      Returns:
      Returns true if the contract was successfully deleted, false if the contract with the passed id value does not exist in the repository.

    • getContractOnId

      public Contract getContractOnId​(int id)
      Function for getting a contract from the repository
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the contract to get
      Returns:
      Returns a contract if a contract with the passed id value was found, null-if such contract does not exist in the repository.
